description: Made for comfort and functionality while fishing or just enjoying the outdoors. The Tamiami features wicking, sun-shielding fabric and a versatile look. Mesh-lined back vents let in and out a cooling breeze in the hottest, muggiest weather. A rod holder on the chest and plenty of low-profile pockets free up your hands.
name: Columbia Sportswear Tamiami II SS Shirt - Mens
